question_text: Welcome to this survey. Press Next to begin.

The following statements refer to experiences that many people have in their everyday lives. Rate according to the label that best describes HOW MUCH that experience has DISTRESSED or BOTHERED you during the PAST MONTH, following the onset of the Coronavirus/COVID-19 crisis in your area.
I have saved up so many things that they get in the way.
option_text: Not at all, A little, Moderately, A lot, Extremely
